name: Pilgrim's Chronicle
desc:
Obtained from the Lord of the Night, this material plays a key role in the creation of Ancient Names. Its essence is "memory," for Natlan's Ley Lines do not record the adventures of outsiders, and so, a special "vessel" is needed here.

Memory flows within this receptacle, and if you focus on its surface, it will display the vital footprints you have left in Natlan.

From what you've heard, Xilonen and Citlali had a rather easy time obtaining this material. This, you presume, is thanks to the Lord of the Night's gentleness and generosity.

value.name: As One We Watch the Setting Sun
value.desc: You witness the emergence of the fifth hero within the Remnants of the Secret Source, and temporary cooperation with The Captain is established. It seems this matter has drawn to a close, and yet the Abyss presses in. It's not time to relax just yet...

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.text: The primal flame illuminates the world. Under the banner of "Kiongozi," humanity takes its first steps toward the future.

The hand of "Uwezo," filled with strength and power, is extended to all who are lonely and sorrowful.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color>

customize.name: Ororon
customize.desc: A young man from the Masters of the Night-Wind who instead lives in the wild alongside all manner of life.

customize.text:
"Bidii" â€“ all may be sacrificed for the beloved land.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color>

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

customize.text:
With your encouragement, "Uthabiti" tasted victory for the first time.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color>

customize.name: Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame
customize.desc: The Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame, the most important competition in Natlan, is about to begin. Meet up with Kachina and the gang before things start.

customize.text: The star that transcends destiny, and the greatest companion.

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc: A Name Engraver of the Nanatzcayan, she is especially skilled at finding a good balance between the heavy responsibilities of her job and living well.

customize.text:
You recovered a true soul alongside "Baraka," and you wish that soul happiness from here on out.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color>

customize.name: Kinich
customize.desc: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

customize.text:
In the words of "Malipo," who was baptized in fire, everything comes at a price.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color>

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.text:
Your journey exploring the mysterious island together shall forever shine in "Umoja"'s heart.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color>

With the ashen city and a burning heart for company, you ascend step by step, witnessing history with your own eyes.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color> <color=#ffffff73>The Chosen One's Promise</color>

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.text:
Having traversed mountains, streams, lakes and seas, it has gradually come to know the world as you have your mission.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color>

customize.name: Revelations from the Past
customize.desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.

customize.name: Chasca
customize.desc: The Peacemaker of the Tlalocan, the ender of all disputes.

customize.text:
"Vuka" is fated to transcend hardship, and answer the expectation of those they deeply love.
<color=#ffffff>Requirement:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Guns and Wings</color>
